movie.title: Party Night
movie.description_intro: Six friends become prey for a sadistic psychopath when they decide to ditch their high school's after prom party for their own celebration at a secluded house.
movie.description_full: Six friends become prey for a sadistic psychopath when they decide to ditch their high school's after prom party for their own celebration at a secluded house.

movies.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
movies.title_english: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
movies.title_long: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning (2006)
movies.summary: In August, 1939, a worker goes into labor while working in a slaughterhouse and dies after a complicated labor, though the deformed child survives. The possibly orphaned baby is dumped in a garbage container and found by a beggar later, who brings him home. Along the years, the mentally retarded and disturbed boy called Thomas is raised by the Hewitt family in spite of having psychological problems as well as suffering from an unnamed skin disorder, later working in a meat packing plant. In July, 1969, when the facility is closed, the inhabitants move to other places, but the deformed, mentally childlike Thomas flies into a rage after being insulted and kills the foreman. His deranged brother (considered his uncle due to their age difference) executes the sheriff that is going to arrest Thomas, and assumes his identity, wearing his clothes,driving his car though the roads in Texas and entitling himself as Sheriff Hoyt. Meanwhile, the brothers Eric and Dean are traveling in a Jeep with...

movies.title: Books of Blood
movies.summary: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.
movies.description_full: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.
movies.synopsis: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

movies.title: Leaving D.C.
movies.summary: After 20 years of living in Washington, D.C., Mark Klein seeks much-needed solace by moving to the remote wilds of West Virginia. To ease his loneliness, he sends regular video updates to members of his OCD-support group back in the city. But Mark gradually realizes that despite his new, isolated setting, he may not be alone. From the endless woods surrounding his home, something else is watching.

movies.title: The Rake
movies.summary: Siblings Ben and Ashley come together 20 years after the murder of their parents to determine the cause of their parents' death. A link between the deaths and the local myth of The Rake is found. Ashley is troubled by the idea that the thing that took her parents' lives may not be finished with her family.
